message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm taking on the risk of inflation.
I'll take a bit more since you're losing value each round
This is my last offer above 50/50, Bob.  It's better for both of us to agree now than to risk losing more to inflation.
You're losing value fast, I'm being generous here
Okay Bob, let's split it evenly.  It's not worth losing any more money to inflation.
